name: Lushtemples — A broad conversation in time — Physical drawing
description:
This NFT is bound to a physical drawing :

Unique edition
Format 30 x 40 cm
Drawing on Hahnemühle “Le Rouge” Watercolor paper 325g/m²   
Plotted with Axidraw SE/A3 using Rotring black ink / Rotring Rapidograph and Isograph pens at 0.5, 0.3, 0.2, 0.1 mm.
Plotting time : about 50 hours. 
Generative design handcoded in Javascript. 
NFT Format : PNG 
NFT Resolution :4500x6000

The drawing  will be sent to the owner by snail mail worldwide at no additional cost. 
Should the owner trade the NFT, he would be inclined to transfer the physical drawing as well, although the specific terms of that trade would no longer be of the artist's concern. 
Note that the physical drawing differs from the following NFT image. 
—
Also The initial owner of the NFT will get a free edition of Lushtemples - A broad conversation in time
—
